channel.title: CVE Feed for Delta Electronics -- CNCSoft
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Delta Electronics -- CNCSoft

item.title: CVE-2021-43982|2024-09-16T17:08:35.130Z -- delta%20electronics -- cncsoft
item.description: Delta Electronics CNCSoft Versions 1.01.30 and prior are vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, which may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2021-44768|2024-09-16T17:58:56.921Z -- delta%20electronics -- cncsoft
item.description: Delta Electronics CNCSoft (Version 1.01.30) and prior) is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds read while processing a specific project file, which may allow an attacker to disclose information.
